name: Summon
description:
A single animal appears at the targeted location and acts immediately after the caster ends their turn. The animal is friendly, following the caster and attacking hostile creatures for 3 rounds plus 1 round per four caster levels or until reduced to 0 or fewer hit points. The caster has no direct control over the summoned creature. Summoned creatures have a creature level equal to your caster level minus 4. More creatures become available as your caster level increases:
  • 4. Wolf
  • 6. Tiger
  • 8. Bear
  • 10. Giant Spider
  • 12. Yeti

upgrades.description: With Summon Elemental, you gain additional choices for summoned creatures.  You can now summon powerful elemental spirits of Fire, Water, Air, and Earth.
With Improved Summon, all summoned creatures now have a creature level equal to your caster level.
